General.Name: Pengdu Agriculture & Animal Husbandry Co Ltd
General.Description: Pengdu Agriculture & Animal Husbandry Co.,Ltd. engages in the grain trade, beef cattle, dairy, and mutton sheep businesses in China and internationally. The company trades in grain, corn, wheat, and other grains, as well as pesticides and fertilizers; breeds and produces mutton sheep; operates dairy farms; and supplies milk. It is also involved in the breeding, slaughtering, processing, and sale of beef cattle; breeding and selling of pigs. Pengdu Agriculture & Animal Husbandry Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1996 and is based in Changsha, China.
General.Address: Building B3, No. 1698 Yuelu West Avenue, Changsha, China, 410205
